meta.title: About Us - Amsterdam Taxi Service | Our Story
meta.description: Discover the story behind Amsterdam's most trusted taxi service. From small family business to 50+ professionals.

description.line1: Since 2008, we've been proudly serving Amsterdam.
description.line2: From 3 taxis to a team of 50+ professionals serving thousands of customers daily.

keyMessage.title: Our mission: perfect service, every ride
keyMessage.description: We believe every ride matters. That's why we invest in our people, vehicles, and technology to give you the best experience. From your first booking to your destination.

sectionHeader.title: Our Story
sectionHeader.description: From a small family business to Amsterdam's most trusted taxi service.

timeline.title: The beginning
timeline.description: Started with 3 taxis and one mission: provide the best service in Amsterdam. What began as a small dream quickly grew into something more.

timeline.title: Growth
timeline.description: Expanded to 15 vehicles and secured our first corporate contracts. Companies began trusting us for their transport needs.

timeline.title: Digital
timeline.description: Introduced GPS tracking and online booking systems. Technology helped us become even better.

timeline.title: Resilience
timeline.description: During COVID-19, we kept driving and supporting our city. It was tough, but we didn't give up.

timeline.title: Today
timeline.description: Now a team of 50+ professionals serving thousands of customers daily. The story continues.

bottomCTA.title: Become part of our story
bottomCTA.description: Whether you ride regularly or book for the first time, we treat you like family.

sectionHeader.title: Our Core Values
sectionHeader.description: This is what we stand for and what drives us to improve every day.

safety.title: Safety first
safety.description: All drivers are screened and certified. Vehicles are maintained according to the highest standards.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Punctuality is our promise. We plan every ride carefully and account for traffic conditions.

service.title: Personal service
service.description: Every customer is unique. We tailor our service to your specific wishes and needs.

expertise.title: Local expertise
expertise.description: 15 years of experience in Amsterdam means we know every route and always find the fastest way.

quality.title: Guaranteed quality
quality.description: Modern fleet, professional drivers, and thousands of satisfied customers daily.

team.title: Stronger together
team.description: Our team of 50+ professionals works as one to make your experience perfect.

bottomStatement.title: Why customers choose us
bottomStatement.description: We're more than a taxi service. We're a reliable partner for all your transport needs in Amsterdam.

sectionHeader.title: Our Services
sectionHeader.description: From business transport to airport shuttle, we have a solution for every situation.

business.title: Business transport
business.description: Representative and reliable transport for your company. From important meetings to corporate events.

airport.title: Airport shuttle
airport.description: Stress-free transport to and from Schiphol and other airports. Always on time for your flight.

group.title: Group transport
group.description: Comfortable travel with family, friends or colleagues. Reach your destination together.

private.title: Private transport
private.description: Personal transport for any occasion. Shopping, nightlife, or simply whenever you need it.

whyChooseUs.title: Why choose us?
whyChooseUs.description: We make every ride an experience with comfort, safety and reliability.

cta.title: Ready to ride with us?
cta.description: Book your ride or explore all our services.

driver.description: Drive for Amsterdam's most trusted taxi service. Flexible hours and good earnings.
